channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OH
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OH

item.title: Report X-2023100921
item.description:
Report X-2023100921

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-07
  • City: GROVE CITY
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Certified personnel were notified of a distressed package, which was pulled from the system. Leakage was contained to the box. Package was placed in a lined red tote. DescribePack: Package was discovered wet and upon inspection, a few of the press and twist caps were loose allowing liquid to leak out. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Caps were tightened to stop further leaking

item.title: Report X-2023100866
item.description:
Report X-2023100866

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-05
  • City: PERRYSBURG
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: carton was found 10-5 at 0100 in the load area, carton was wet and was brought to QA for inspection DescribePack: inner containers had loose/missing lids which caused major internal leakage DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: ppe was used to contain package in a plastic hazmat bag which was then placed in a sealed plastic tote

item.title: Report X-2023100864
item.description:
Report X-2023100864

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-05
  • City: GROVE CITY
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: CERTIFICATED PERSONNEL INFORMED OF DISTRESSED PACKAGE. SHIPMENT TAKEN OUT OF SYSTEM FLOW, NOTED LIQUID RELEASE CONTAINED TO PACKAGE. DISTRESSED PACKAGE CONTAINED IN A LINED HAZMAT TOTE. DescribePack: THE PLASTIC BAG WITHIN THE PACKAGE HAS A SMALL PUCTURE HOLE ALLOWING LEAKAGE DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: PLACED IN A RED TOTE

item.title: Report X-2023100668
item.description:
Report X-2023100668

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-14T18:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-03
  • City: PERRYSBURG
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023100668 SequenceEvent: pkg was found during the unload process on 10-3 at 20:30 and taken to qa for inspection. DescribePack: carton was wet due to two leaking bottles inside that had loose caps. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: ppe used to place carton in a hazmat bag and then into a plastic tote. 2. X-2023100674 SequenceEvent: pkg was found during the unload process on 10-3 at 19:30 and taken to qa for inspection. DescribePack: carton was wet due to two leaking bottles inside that had loose lids. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: ppe used to place carton in a hazmat bag and then into a plastic tote.
